channel.title: CVE Feed for PiBrewing -- CraftBeerPi 4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PiBrewing -- CraftBeerPi 4

item.title: CVE-2024-3955|2024-05-02T09:43:51.941Z -- PiBrewing -- CraftBeerPi 4
item.description: URL GET parameter "logtime" utilized within the "downloadlog" function from "cbpi/http_endpoints/http_system.py" is subsequently passed to the "os.system" function in "cbpi/controller/system_controller.py" without prior validation allowing to execute arbitrary code.This issue affects CraftBeerPi 4: from 4.0.0.58 (commit 563fae9) before 4.4.1.a1 (commit 57572c7).
